abstract: Warren Buffett, who received well wishes from President Obama on Wednesday, didn’t unnerve investors with news of his prostate cancer.
snippet: Warren Buffett, who received well wishes from President Obama on Wednesday, didn’t unnerve investors with news of his prostate cancer.
lead_paragraph: Not every corporate executive gets a call from the president asking about his health. But then, there is only one Warren E. Buffett.

headline.main: Berkshire Shareholders Unfazed by Buffett Diagnosis

byline.original: By Eric Owles and Jeffrey Cane
